rf_search module¶

This is the main module we used to fit the models. After defining a pipeline and a param grid, a grid search with CV is initialized and all the important informations about the search are saved in a location choosen by the user.

rf_search.search(data, pipe, param_grid, filepath=None, cv=None)[source]¶

This is the main function we used to do the hyperparameter searches. We set up grid search with a TimeSeries CV and then we save all the useful informations about the search, such as the f1 score on the test and training set, the computational time etc, as a csv file.

Parameters

  • data (DataFrame) – The dataset used to fit the model

  • pipe (Pipeline) – The pipeline

  • param_grid (dict) – The param grid with the hyperparameters we want to test

  • filepath (string (default=None)) – The filepath in which the dataframe containig all the informations about the search is saved

  • cv (CV) – The cross validation parameters

Yields

df (pd.DataFrame) – A DataFrame including all the information about the GridSearch
